parameters: Don't think this is over,\. travelers\..\..\..
\C[18]The sin of gluttony will live on...\C[0]
What the hell is your problem?\.
Why did you lock us up in one of your mansion's wings?!
I vote we skip the chatter and just fucking wring his
\}\N[1],\. we can't do that yet.\. We have to milk as much of the plot out of the obvious
boss that we can or it might not make sense to the player that we are just arbitrarily
I mean, there are a lot of questions to be answered, really.
The most pressing one is obviously "why did you lock us up",\.
but also, why was there a hole in the wall?\. What happened to the
previous adventurers that we found dead in the mines?\. Why were
there mines beneath the mansion and the town at all?
Even \C[1]your own Page\C[0] had concerns about you and what
you were planning for the former adventurers (rest in peace).
And if ya don't give us answers we like,\. we'll probably just
chop you up and figure it out in the next chapter!
Gentlemen, please. As I said, this was simply a misunderstanding.\.
There is a perfectly valid explanation for all of the concerns
you have presented, and I shall give you the answers.
Let us start with "why is there a hole in the wall?".\.
It is fairly clear that the hole in the wall was there because the
previous group of rude and rambunctious adventurers that I welcomed
into my home broke one of my statues and damaged the wall.
They were here very recently, mere days before you arrived
into town,\. so naturally I had not the time to call for the
carpenters guild in the Erocian Kingdom yet.
"What happened to the previous adventurers that we found dead
in the mines?" you asked next.\. Also easy to explain.
They escaped my west wing and must've broken limbs in the
tumble down the shaft into the mines they discovered.
And naturally,\. my slaves I employed to mine the delicious
and mouth-watering \C[8]Pearl Salt\C[0] must've gotten hungry!
Afterall, I haven't fed them in weeks!\.
And of course, lastly,\. "why" did I lock you two up in
the west wing?\. So I could save you for dinner!
The salt\..\..\.. it speaks to me.
It begs to cure your bodies of their pointless lives.\.
Besides,\. your energy is clearly not of this world-\. I would
be a fool to pass up the opportunity to devour your power myself!
My name is \C[18]Wyatt,\. the lord of gluttony\C[0]!\.
Prepare to be devoured,\. my succulent treats!
I gotta admit,\. I didn't see that coming.
I figured it out as soon as he locked us up in that west wing.
See? And that is why we travel together.\.
Not only would I have gotten trapped alone,\. but probably
woulda just killed him off right away when I met him in
Like seriously,\. why the fuck is he even out here in the
That's actually a pretty good question.\. He did answer
those questions,\. but \C[2]seemed a lot more evil than before\C[0].
He looked like he was a humanoid, and most humanoids don't
Let's do a quick recap of things then.
First off, when we initially met the mayor dude...
He seemed really excited that we finally made it!
He seemed kind of annoyed that we showed up.
He seemed really sad that we showed up.
He seemed really excited that we finally made it!
Was he excited?\. I don't quite remember that\..\..\..
He seemed kind of annoyed that we showed up.
Yeah, thats what I remember too!
He seemed really sad that we showed up.
He might've been sad, but I definitely didn't see it like that.
...but if what he said was correct,\. then he did JUST
have some really rude visitors that broke his statue and wall.
Are we really gonna believe a fat piece of shit like that?
I bet \C[1]they were responding to some kind of invitation\C[0]
because why else would a party of adventurers just stroll up
to a big ass mansion like that?
You do have a point,\. why would random parties of adventurers
just show up to the mayor's house otherwise uninvited?
He was having a birthday party and the whole town was invited.
They were actually plumbers and his fat shit clogged his toilet.
There was some kind of advertisement calling for adventurers.
He was having a birthday party and the whole town was invited.

humanoid planets are so far evolved that the date of birth is
They were actually plumbers and his fat shit clogged his toilet.
I know I've called my fair share of plumbers for my toilet!
Come on,\. are you even taking this seriously?
There was some kind of advertisement calling for adventurers.
But if that was the case, then why would he lock them up?
He did lock us up too,\. maybe there is something
in common between us and them?
Yeah!\. That's right!\. He did mention something about how
our energy levels were high and that he wanted to devour

We kinda hashed out the plot up until this point,\. but
We dove into that Erocian hell hole with the slime.\.
Got locked up by a crazy fat werewolf.\.
Butchered a bunch of forest faeries for acorns.\.
And eventually slayed our captor, the crazy fatty werewolf.
Why don't we head over to that \C[3]Erocian Kingdom\C[0] that

Maybe the kingdom has someone that can \C[2]make us some tools\C[0].
